title: Which are the top schools for personality development in Dubai? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many schools in Dubai have started promoting holistic development for children. Because, in today’s world, academic excellence is no longer enough. A child’s physical and psychological welfare is equal in importance. Moreover, personality development is finally getting the attention it deserves across top schools in Dubai. Schooling systems across Dubai are starting to change. They are beginning to acknowledge and address the need for a well-rounded education and child development. They are beginning to prioritize and promote activities that contribute to a child’s overall personal development. Amongst the front runners of this new model of education is the Global Indian International School, Dubai. They promote universal values, ethics, discipline, creativity, and personality development in the initial schooling years. During high school, the focus is shifted to academic achievement, leadership, entrepreneurship, and key competencies for vocational and career progression. They have introduced the 9 Gems model program to help students hone their personality and to inspire well-rounded growth in them. Other top schools are also catching up. It is only a matter of time before the future of schooling systems change for good. But for now, we can say that GIIS is a top school in Dubai for personality development.
